Name: Constellations: Puzzles in the Sky
About the game: Constellation is a transformative relationship with constellations and puzzles, to discover something that only the stars hold. Take a comfy spot and enjoy this experience! Increase mindfulness, concentration and focus through a conversation with the stars. Evade yourself from everyday life as you build constellations in the sky. Constellations is a meditative, minimalist puzzle game about finding patterns in the stars. In each level, connect the stars without the lines crossing and slowly fill the sky with constellations. Explore a starmap full of carefully designed levels with diverse mechanics, or go to the black hole to play endless puzzles. Stars, constellations and figures can be found as main elements: Stars reveal the way to reach a sky completely made up of constellations. Some constellations reveal incredible pictures. - Simple and intuitive puzzle mechanics for all ages. - Polished controls for a satisfying experience. - Meditative astronomic chill visuals and music. - Solidly designed campaign with over 100 levels with varied mechanics. - Level generator with infinite combinations.
